Vision Archive API Docs
  • Registration Tests
  • /auth/forgot 3
  • /auth/signup 3

Registration Tests

/auth/forgot

  • should set a new token on request by existing user

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/forgot
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/forgot
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 26

    {
  "email": "becky@made.com"
}
    curl -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "content-length: 26" -d '{"email":"becky@made.com"}' "http://visionarchive.io/auth/forgot"
    Response 200 OK
    body 
    {
  "token": 1
}

  • should reset a password token if there is a token on that account

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/forgot
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/forgot
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 26

    {
  "email": "becky@made.com"
}
    curl -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "content-length: 26" -d '{"email":"becky@made.com"}' "http://visionarchive.io/auth/forgot"
    Response 200 OK
    body 
    {
  "token": 1
}

  • should return a token for a login

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/signup
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/signup
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 57

/auth/signup

  • should fail an empty request

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/signup
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/signup
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 29

    {
  "user": null,
  "password": null
}
    curl -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "content-length: 29" -d '{"user":null,"password":null}' "http://visionarchive.io/auth/signup"
    Response 200 OK
    body 
    {
  "error": "Email and Password required"
}

  • should register a new user on the db

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/signup
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/signup
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 78

    {
  "email": "becky@made.com",
  "name": "becky",
  "password": "becky",
  "roles": [
    "admin"
  ]
}
    curl -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "content-length: 78" -d '{"email":"becky@made.com","name":"becky","password":"becky","roles":["admin"]}' "http://visionarchive.io/auth/signup"
    Response 200 OK
    body 
    {
  "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyIkX18iOnsic3RyaWN0TW9kZSI6dHJ1ZSwiaW5zZXJ0aW5nIjpmYWxzZSwiZ2V0dGVycyI6eyJnb29nbGUiOnt9fSwid2FzUG9wdWxhdGVkIjpmYWxzZSwic2NvcGUiOnsiX192IjowLCJjcmVhdGVkIjoiMjAxNi0wMy0yMlQwMjoyODoyMC40NjJaIiwiX2FkbWluIjoiNTZmMGFkYzRjMzJjOTlmYzRmMGJhZjI4IiwiZW1haWwiOiJiZWNreUBtYWRlLmNvbSIsIm5hbWUiOiJiZWNreSIsInBhc3N3b3JkIjoiJDJhJDEwJFJGbVhQSHZNM1hBNGZ5ajBjcVZ6d3V5azc2UXk4WlI2ZmdFejRla3JxVldPUzRRdDJQODFpIiwiX2lkIjoiNTZmMGFkYzRjMzJjOTlmYzRmMGJhZjI4Iiwicm9sZXMiOlsiY3JlYXRlX3NlbGYiLCJnZXRfc2VsZiIsInVwZGF0ZV9zZWxmIiwiZGVsZXRlX3NlbGYiLCJjcmVhdGVfdXNlciIsImdldF91c2VyIiwidXBkYXRlX3VzZXIiLCJkZWxldGVfdXNlciIsImNyZWF0ZV9pY29uIiwiZ2V0X2ljb24iLCJ1cGRhdGVfaWNvbiIsImRlbGV0ZV9pY29uIiwiZ2V0X2FsbF91c2VyIl19LCJhY3RpdmVQYXRocyI6eyJwYXRocyI6eyJlbWFpbCI6InJlcXVpcmUifSwic3RhdGVzIjp7Imlnbm9yZSI6e30sImRlZmF1bHQiOnt9LCJpbml0Ijp7fSwibW9kaWZ5Ijp7fSwicmVxdWlyZSI6eyJlbWFpbCI6dHJ1ZX19LCJzdGF0ZU5hbWVzIjpbInJlcXVpcmUiLCJtb2RpZnkiLCJpbml0IiwiZGVmYXVsdCIsImlnbm9yZSJdfSwiZW1pdHRlciI6eyJkb21haW4iOm51bGwsIl9ldmVudHMiOnt9LCJfZXZlbnRzQ291bnQiOjAsIl9tYXhMaXN0ZW5lcnMiOjB9fSwiaXNOZXciOmZhbHNlLCJfZG9jIjp7InJvbGVzIjpbImNyZWF0ZV9zZWxmIiwiZ2V0X3NlbGYiLCJ1cGRhdGVfc2VsZiIsImRlbGV0ZV9zZWxmIiwiY3JlYXRlX3VzZXIiLCJnZXRfdXNlciIsInVwZGF0ZV91c2VyIiwiZGVsZXRlX3VzZXIiLCJjcmVhdGVfaWNvbiIsImdldF9pY29uIiwidXBkYXRlX2ljb24iLCJkZWxldGVfaWNvbiIsImdldF9hbGxfdXNlciJdLCJnb29nbGUiOnt9LCJfaWQiOiI1NmYwYWRjNGMzMmM5OWZjNGYwYmFmMjgiLCJwYXNzd29yZCI6IiQyYSQxMCRSRm1YUEh2TTNYQTRmeWowY3FWend1eWs3NlF5OFpSNmZnRXo0ZWtycVZXT1M0UXQyUDgxaSIsIm5hbWUiOiJiZWNreSIsImVtYWlsIjoiYmVja3lAbWFkZS5jb20iLCJfYWRtaW4iOiI1NmYwYWRjNGMzMmM5OWZjNGYwYmFmMjgiLCJjcmVhdGVkIjoiMjAxNi0wMy0yMlQwMjoyODoyMC40NjJaIiwiX192IjowfSwiX3ByZXMiOnsiJF9fb3JpZ2luYWxfc2F2ZSI6W251bGwsbnVsbCxudWxsLG51bGwsbnVsbF19LCJfcG9zdHMiOnsiJF9fb3JpZ2luYWxfc2F2ZSI6W119LCJpYXQiOjE0NTg2MTM3MDAsImV4cCI6MTQ1ODcwMDEwMH0.SxM684jQS0Zww5bWpRrNBEFs-vGrfuTYxZFv5TjcqA8"
}

  • should not double-register a user that exists in the system

    POST
    POST 
    /auth/signup
    Sample request
    headers payload curl 
    /auth/signup
    content-type: application/json
content-length: 60

    {
  "email": "becky@made.com",
  "name": "becky",
  "password": "becky"
}
    curl -X POST -H "content-type: application/json" -H "content-length: 60" -d '{"email":"becky@made.com","name":"becky","password":"becky"}' "http://visionarchive.io/auth/signup"
    Response 200 OK
    body 
    "That user already exists."
